title: IsReady returns false for both 'blocked' and 'dependency missing/corrupt' - no distinction
description:
storage.go IsReady() returns (false, nil) in two different situations:
1. Dependency exists but isn't closed yet (correct - not ready)
2. Dependency issue can't be loaded at all (error - broken data)

Callers can't tell the difference. A corrupted dependency issue blocks the dependent forever with no error signal.

Related: LoadAllIssues() fails entirely if one issue has bad JSON. Should support partial loads or skip-with-warning.

Fix: Return a typed error or a richer result (ready bool, blockers []string, errors []error) so callers can distinguish 'blocked by open dep' from 'blocked by missing/corrupt dep'.

File: wong_impl/internal/wongdb/storage.go lines 83-86, 46-61
